name: Walls (Evilgrapez)
description:
EDIT: Fixed the price of the game so that it's no longer $1.49. I don't know how we missed that, but we did.

In Walls, you control a blue triangle named Fred, and you have to dodge the walls beside you and get outside the level. If you fail, Fred will no longer be Fred, but Joe, and since there are no Joes allowed on the planet he's on, he dies. You must save Fred!

Features:

  • 8 levels!
  • Awesome soundtrack!
  • Except for You Can't Stop The Electric Guitar. I don't even know why we included it.
  • Really hard levels!
  • Uh, moving!
  • Moving again!
  • I'm running out of things!
  • And so much more!

Controls (Game):

Use the arrow keys or the mouse to move left and right.

Portals make you move up or down instead. Be careful with those.

Walls make you turn into Joe, and when you turn into Joe, you die. So don't touch walls.

Controls (Menu):

Simple! Use the mouse to click on things!
